Text: Thanks very much for sharing, this is a great collection!

Thanks. There's another 9000-odd where they came from - just working my way through them, cleaning them up, cataloguing them, etc.

If there's anything particular you are after...

Thanks!

We live in a great time, to have easy access to so many books, and to be able to take them with us anywhere in a small electronic device.

Read and learn, the more you know the less they can manipulate you!
